description:
The middle schoolers are invited to participate in the U-17 Japanese team`s training camp. The "losers" who were once dismissed from the camp have overcome their trials and returned, and the camp is lively once again. In room 205, Akaya tells his silent roommates stories about fallen soldiers. In room 201, Fuji and his roommates excitedly discuss the potted plants they brought. In room 211, the Golden Pair starts a pillow fight...
Meanwhile, Sanada carries a message from Coach Mifune. The camp`s first string of powerful players are returning from their month long tour abroad!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 革命への前奏曲[プレリュード]
